author: Thich Nhat Hanh
message: The most precious gift we can offer anyone is our attention. When mindfulness embraces those we love, they will bloom like flowers.
title: Thought of the day

author: Jack Dixon
message: If you focus on results, you will never change. If you focus on change, you will get results.
title: Thought of the day

author: G. K. Chesterton
message: I would maintain that thanks are the highest form of thought, and that gratitude is happiness doubled by wonder.
title: Thought of the day

author: Denis Waitley
message: There are two primary choices in life: to accept conditions as they exist, or accept the responsibility for changing them.
title: Thought of the day
